tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Understand what Database Vault is and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)
tutorials.description: Create a restore point which will enable you to repeat all the labs if desired

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Data Redaction
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to disable Database Vault.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Database Vault
tutorials.description: This lab will walk you through how to enable Database Vault for the workshop image

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Protecting Sensitive Data (Label Security)
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to leverage OLS to track consent and force restriction for GDPR
